popular_beaches.name: Baga Beach
popular_beaches.description: Known for vibrant nightlife, water sports, and lively beach shacks.

popular_beaches.name: Marina Beach
popular_beaches.description: The longest urban beach in India, famous for its sunrise views and cultural landmarks.

mountains.name: Kanchenjunga
mountains.significance: The third-highest mountain in the world and revered as a sacred mountain by the people of Sikkim.

mountains.name: Nanda Devi
mountains.significance: The second-highest peak in India, part of the UNESCO World Heritage Nanda Devi and Valley of Flowers National Parks.

adventures.name: Rishikesh
adventures.description: Known as the 'Adventure Capital of India,' offering adrenaline-pumping activities amid the serene beauty of the Himalayas.

adventures.name: Manali
adventures.description: A hub for adventure sports, especially known for skiing in Solang Valley and Rohtang Pass.
